movie.title: King of Thieves
movie.plot: A true crime movie about a crew of retired crooks who pull off a major heist in London's jewelry district. What starts off as their last criminal hurrah, quickly turns into a brutal nightmare due to greed. Based on infamous true events.

events.title: the Hatton Garden Safe Deposit Company is broken into
